summary: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
cast: Dave Foley|Kevin Spacey|Julia Louis-Dreyfus|Hayden Panettiere|Phyllis Diller|Richard Kind|David Hyde Pierce|Joe Ranft|Denis Leary|Jonathan Harris|Madeline Kahn|Bonnie Hunt|Michael McShane|John Ratzenberger|Brad Garrett|Roddy McDowall|Edie McClurg|Alex Rocco|David Ossman|Carlos Alazraqui|Jack Angel|Bob Bergen|Kimberly J. title: Bichos: Una aventura en miniatura
